motto1.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
motto1.author: Cory House

motto3.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
motto3.author: Peter Drucker

motto4.text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
motto4.author: Bill Gates

motto5.text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
motto5.author: Steve Jobs

BannerFooter.motto6: From concept to code — I make it real.
BannerFooter.motto9: Crafting solutions with clarity and code.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.subtitle: I am Nick Strofyllas, a Frontend Developer.

intro.paragraph1: Hi, I'm Nikos. I work as a Frontend Developer at DPG Digital Media Group, where my team creates compelling UI/UX experiences for users.
intro.paragraph2: With over three years of experience designing and developing web software for companies and individuals, I have honed my skills in creating intuitive, user-friendly web applications that meet the needs of diverse clients. From concept to final delivery, I am experienced in all stages of the software development lifecycle.
